alert.note: Alert for Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:05PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Helena, north central Livingston and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 505 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montpelier, or 9 miles west of Amite, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite City, Kentwood, Roseland, Montpelier, Darlington, Easleyville and Tangipahoa. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 43 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
